dcterms:creator: M. Pemy
dcterms:description: This dataset contains models of financial markets that switch regimes, specifically focusing on L´evy processes.
dcterms:title: Regime Switching L´evy Processes

dcterms:creator: M. Pemy
dcterms:description: This dataset provides insights into the optimal selling strategies within a regime switching L´evy market framework.
dcterms:title: Optimal Selling Rule in a Regime Switching Model

dcterms:creator: M. Pemy
dcterms:description: This dataset focuses on the optimal stopping problems associated with Markov switching L´evy processes.
dcterms:title: Optimal Stopping of Markov Switching L´evy Processes

dcterms:creator: Moustapha Pemy
Qing Zhang
dcterms:description: This dataset examines optimal stock liquidation strategies in a regime switching model with a finite time horizon.
dcterms:title: Optimal Stock Liquidation in Regime Switching Model
